info.title: NECO APCIC Manager Remote
info.description: API for managing NECO APCIC staff, stations, states, and related entities

get.description: Get all staff members with pagination and optional search.

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search term for name, fileno, or email
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Search term for name, fileno, or email

post.description: Create a new staff member.

get.description: Get a staff member by ID.

post.description: Delete multiple staff records by IDs.

delete.description: Delete all staff records. Use with caution!

post.description:
Upload staff data from an Excel or CSV file.

Expected columns (case-insensitive):
- fileno (required): Staff file number
- full_name (required): Staff full name
- station: Work station
- qualification: Educational qualification
- sex: Gender (M/F)
- dob: Date of birth
- dofa: Date of first appointment
- doan: Date of Appointment to NECO
- dopa: Date of present appointment
- rank: Staff rank
- conr: CONR
- state: State of origin
- lga: Local government area
- email: Email address
- remark: Remarks

Append staff data from an Excel or CSV file.
Existing records (by fileno) will be skipped.

Promote staff via file upload.
Updates 'rank', 'conr', and optionally 'dopa' for staff matching 'fileno'.
preview/dry-run mode is default (confirm=False).

parameters.name: confirm

schema.description: If True, performs update. If False, returns preview.
schema.title: Confirm

parameters.description: If True, performs update. If False, returns preview.

parameters.name: promotion_date

schema.description: The Date of Present Appointment (DOPA) to set for promoted staff. Format: YYYY-MM-DD
schema.title: Promotion Date

parameters.description: The Date of Present Appointment (DOPA) to set for promoted staff. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

Upload station data from an Excel or CSV file.

Expected columns (case-insensitive):
- station_code (required): Station code

- zone: Geopolitical zone
- active: Active status (1/0 or true/false)

Get all BECE custodians for a specific state.

post.description:
Upload state data from an Excel or CSV file.

Expected columns (case-insensitive):
- state_code (required): State code
- name (required): State name
- capital (required): Capital city
- mkv_count: Number of marking venues
- schools_count: Number of schools
- custodians_count: Number of custodians

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search term for name or code
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Search term for name or code

post.description: Create a new school.

get.description: Get a school by ID.

post.description:
Upload school data from an Excel or CSV file.

Expected columns (case-insensitive):
- state_code or state_id (required): Reference to state
- name (required): School name
- code: School code
- address: Address
- candidates: Number of candidates
- active: Active status (1/0 or true/false)

get.description: Get all APC records with pagination.

post.description: Create a new APC record.

get.description: Get an APC record by ID.

post.description: Delete multiple APC records by IDs.

Upload APC data from an Excel or CSV file.

Expected columns (case-insensitive):
- file_no (required)
- name (required)
- conraiss
- station
... and other APC fields

Append new APC data from an Excel or CSV file.

This endpoint stricty checks if a file_no already exists.
- If file_no exists: Ignore and add to skipped list.
- If file_no does not exist: Append (create) new record.

Expected columns (case-insensitive):
- file_no (required)
- name (required)
- conraiss
- station
... and other APC fields

get.description:
Get current staff portal lock status (public endpoint).

Returns the lock status for login, APC, and posting.
This allows the frontend to show appropriate messages to users.

post.description:
Authenticate staff member using their file number and DOB.

- **staff_number**: Staff file number (fileno from SDL)
- **password**: Date of birth in ddmmyy format (e.g., 260481 for 26 Apr 1981)

get.description: Get current staff member's SDL data.

put.description:
Update current staff member's contact information.

Only phone and email can be updated through this endpoint.

get.description: Get current staff member's APC data (read-only).

schema.title: Response Get My Apc Api Staff Portal Me Apc Get

get.description: Get current staff member's posting data (read-only).
Get current staff member's HOD APC data (read-only).

schema.title: Response Get My Hod Apc Api Staff Portal Me Hod Apc Get

get.description: Get current staff member's HOD posting data (read-only).
